column4: How do I get the newest version of Eclipse (Ganymede) through apt-get? I have the previous version Europa, and apt-get is telling there are no updates for it.
Any ideas? I should be able to get it without downloading some .tar file and extracting myself huh?
I don't know what that is.  Is that going to help me get it all setup through apt-get?
if Eclipse has packaged their own .deb file then you're in luck.
